entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 except minus 3 in the Natuashish area. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9 except minus 3 in the Natuashish area. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Showers in the Natuashish area in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 10 April 2023
